content:
>Weâ€™re sending you this reminder that beginning March 16, 2021, LastPass Free will include access on one type of device only: either computers (including all desktops and laptops) or mobile devices (including all mobile phones, smart watches, and tablets).
>
>To continue using LastPass across all device types, you can upgrade to Premium or Families at a limited-time discounted rate of 25% off.

content_rendered:
Weâ€™re sending you this reminder that beginning March 16, 2021, LastPass Free will include access on one type of device only: either computers (including all desktops and laptops) or mobile devices (including all mobile phones, smart watches, and tablets).

To continue using LastPass across all device types, you can upgrade to Premium or Families at a limited-time discounted rate of 25% off.
